gist.headline: Summer of Code Logistics
gist.blurb: We're tidying up the Google Summer of Code dashboard. Mentors are finding their projects and limits are being set!
gist.summary: Updated the GSoC project page to assign mentors to specific project IDs and implemented a project hard limit.
gist.impact: GSoC participants will now see updated mentor assignments and project constraints on the dashboard.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a teacher or coordinator, organizing a project board for students. Represents the GSoC organizational updates.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot standing in front of a chalkboard organizing a list of summer coding projects. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi classroom vibes like Stardew Valley schoolhouse. Pixel text on board: 'GSOC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee as a summer camp counselor reviewing a pixelated project map. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and sunny pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like A Short Hike. Pixel text 'GSOC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
